modShortDescription: In A18 b149, POI farmplots became useless to harvest. With this 7 Days to Die modlet, you have a chance of 35% to successfully harvest an usable farmplot.
modDescription:
In A18 b149, POI farmplots became useless to harvest. 4 nitrate and some clay? That’s not right. You should still have a tiny chance to gather a plot. With this 7 Days to Die modlet, you have a chance of 35% to successfully harvest an usable farmplot.

Maybe Claymore will look into it to pair it with skills and so have a better chance to get one – but he’ll see. Currently he is fine in this state.

Compatibility: A18 b149+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/c57m31cv4amfqmd/Claymore_Farmplot_Chance.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
